name: morse-mentor
description: An interactive web application designed to help users learn and practice Morse code through various methods including rhythmic learning, quizzes, and a comprehensive reference guide. Users can track their progress and customize settings like sound and playback speed.

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/index.html && cp manifest.json public/manifest.json && cp -R icons public/icons && cp service-worker.js public/service-worker.js && npx esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --format=esm --jsx=automatic --loader:.ts=tsx --external:react --external:react-dom/client --define:process.env.API_KEY=\""$API_KEY\""
